Member Function Documentation

void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.Synapse.Connect ( ISynapse  synapse  ) 

Parameters:
synapse The synapse to be connected.

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.Synapse.Connect (  ) 

Connects the synapse.

A synapse is said to be connected if: 1. it is aware of its source neuron (and vice versa), and 2. it is aware of its target neuron (and vice versa).

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.Synapse.Disconnect ( ISynapse  synapse  ) 

Parameters:
synapse The synapse to be disconnected.

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.Synapse.Disconnect (  ) 

Disconnects the synapse.

A synapse is said to be disconnected if: 1. its source neuron is not aware of it (and vice versa) and 2. its target neuron is not aware of it (and vice versa).

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.Synapse.Initialize (  ) 

Initializes the synapse.

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.Synapse.Jitter ( double  jitterNoiseLimit  ) 

Jitters the synapse so that the neural network deviates from its local minimum position where further learning is of no use.

Parameters:
jitterNoiseLimit The maximum absolute jitter noise added.

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.
